name: The Great Ocean
description:
Dive into an adventure in the earth’s oceans. Explore in your high-tech submarine fascinating spots like the Galapagos, the Arctic, Cozumel or the Deep Sea. Solve quests in each level using your upgradeable tools like the laser to cut free jailed whales, the scanner to get info for over 100 species, the welder to repair broken subsea pipes and the beam grabber to collect WW2 wreck pieces or corals. Swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles. And take action: you can support the work of real NGOs.

Every time you re-visit one of the levels there will be new things to explore like new quests or new fish species. Just like the ocean our levels show the constant change.

We partner with the WDC - the Whale and Dolphin Conservation, the leading charity dedicated to the protection of whales and dolphins, and support their work. More information here: https://us.whales.org/

The level missions are based around real sunken submarines, battleship wrecks and planes, Deep Sea creatures or Caribbean coral reefs. You will also encounter the giants and living wonders of the oceans from sharks, to dolphins, sea turtles and of course the blue whale and learn more about this unique, beautiful and threatened world. With your mission success you contribute to protect and save the oceans. Many hours of gameplay with a personal story, great interaction and challenging quests with a leaderboard engage players on the exploration of the oceans and to go where no one has gone before.

We made a nice tutorial level so that you get comfortable how to move around and use the tools of the ROV best.
You have a badge system with all tools upgradeable, a new Quest type: cut nets to free whales, a walkable ship with a holographic table, higher replayability of levels with changing oceans, a 'Maximal Comfort' setting against Nausea in VR.

Players can also have a positive impact to improve Ocean Health in reality by supporting NGOs that collaborated on making the game.



First Levels in Early Access: Galapagos, Cozumel, Arctic Ocean, WW2 shipwreck German Battlecruiser Scharnhorst

Next Levels: California and others more exciting content is coming thanks to our successful Earth Day crowdfunding campaign.
